definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: Is 13:14 gazelle ;—´[[ח]] abs. De 12:15 +; pl. [[חְבָיִם]] 2Sa 2:18, [[חְבָאיִם]] 1Ch 12:9 (Gi Baer; van d. H. v:8), [[חְבָאוֹת]] Ct So 2:7, So 3:5; —gazelle, allowed as food De 14:5, cf. De 12:15, De 12:22 (although not for sacrif., Dr ; all + [[אַיׇּל]]), so De 15:22 (+ [[אַיׇּל]], [[יַחְמוּר]], etc.), v. 1Ki 5:3; sim. of swiftness 2Sa 2:18, 1Ch 12:9 v. supr., Pr 6:5; of grace and beauty Ct So 2:9, So 2:17, So 8:14 (cf. Jacob:Arab. Dichter iv.20 f.); hence used in adjuration So 2:7, So 3:5 ( + [[אילות]]); [[מֻדָּח]] ´[[ח]] Is 13:14, sim. of fugitives.
